mapper.select: SELECT l.list_title,l.all_board_list_no, l.id , c.title, c.content, c.write_date, c.file_count , c.comment_count , c.kanban_list_no, a.name , a.team_no , a.board_type_no FROM `KANBAN_LIST` l LEFT OUTER JOIN `KANBAN_CARD` c ON l.kanban_list_no = c.kanban_list_no LEFT OUTER JOIN `all_board_list` a ON l.all_board_list_no = a.all_board_list_no where TEAM_NO = #{teamNo};
